thread.title: VIDEO: Sumo wrestlers face off in must-see track race
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Sumo wrestlers face off in must-see track race

author: Kyle Newport, Bleacher Report
title: VIDEO: Sumo wrestlers face off in must-see track race
text: VIDEO: Sumo wrestlers face off in must-see track race Comment By Kyle Newport, Bleacher Report Hope Star - Hope, AR By Kyle Newport, Bleacher Report Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 9:14 AM By Kyle Newport, Bleacher Report Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 9:14 AM As much fun as it is to witness Usain Bolt sprint around the track at an incredible speed, this race may be more entertaining than any you will see during the Olympics. Because, let's be honest: Who hasn't dreamt of seeing sumo wrestlers race? This event is everything you thought it would be and more. Not only did the race actually happen, but it wound up having a photo finish. There needs to be a petition started to make this an Olympic sport. It's just fascinating to watch. By Kyle Newport, Bleacher Report Hope Star - Hope, AR By Kyle Newport, Bleacher Report Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 9:14 AM
